column4: this person is having my problem except mine isn't fixable by a reboot

can someone please help me, i have a heap of work to do, my harddrive failed, so ubuntu is my last chance (or can someone at least tell me i'm on some kind of queue of being helped), sorry if i'm being pushy but i'm really rushed atm
not really a queue, someone just helps if they know how.  If someone doesn't help, usually just means no one that is around knows how
